text:
If I had to learn AI from 0, I’d start here:

(7 free guides to master AI):

1. Mastering AI without coding: how-to-ai.store 
Perfect for non-technical people to master AI.

2. OpenAI Academy: academy.openai.com 
The official academy of ChatGPT & OpenAI.

3. Midjourney course - https://lnkd.in/divdXvMp
The quick & easy (and free) guide for Midjourney v7.

4. Google Veo-3 course: https://lnkd.in/dV69TkwH 
The official guide to master Veo, the video model from Google (which is the best on the market).

5. Using simple automation: https://lnkd.in/d85dQ8pq 
The official guide to be better at using simple automation with n8n.

6. How to use Claude artifacts: https://lnkd.in/gjs9ux9C 
Better at creating Claude artifacts. 
 
7. Practical guide to AI agents: https://lnkd.in/d_e2FP2u 
OpenAI made this (somehow) unknown guide.
